element.name: Titan's Blade
element.prerequisite: warrior saint patron, pact of the blade

description.p: Warrior Saint patron, pact of the blade

You can create a greatsword of polished star-steel capped with a shining gemstone using your Pact of the Blade feature. Whenever you strike a creature with this weapon, you can choose to unleash a wave of magical force to push them up to 15 feet directly away from you. If this causes them to strike a surface, they and the surface take 1d6 bludgeoning damage. You can choose to use your Charisma modifier for attack and damage rolls with this weapon.

element.name: Scripture of Natural Law
element.prerequisite: warrior saint patron, pact of the tome

description.p: Warrior Saint patron, pact of the tome
You can cast zone of truth once without expending a spell slot. This use recovers whenever you finish a short or long rest. You automatically succeed on saving throws against this spell.

element.name: Servant Priests
element.prerequisite: warrior saint patron, pact of the chain

description.p: Warrior Saint patron, pact of the chain
While you have a scribeant swarm as your familiar, it gains additional maximum hit points equal to your warlock level, and you gain advantage on Investigation and Perception checks.

description.p: Warrior Saint patron, level 16

Whenever you have activated Hands of the Saint, your body flows with righteous power. You can choose to use your highest ability score modifier when making attack rolls with weapons or spells, and can choose to add your highest ability score modifier to damage rolls with weapons, in place of their normal modifier.

description.p: You can choose to have your AC equal 13 + your Strength modifier, as the robes of the Warrior-Saint cover your armor and flesh to protect you from harm. A shield's benefits apply as normal. Additionally, you can bypass the effects of the nondetection spell as the Saint's impartial gaze comes more easily to you.

element.name: Acolytes of the Arachnid
element.prerequisite: weaver of lies patron, pact of the tome

description.p: Weaver of lies patron, pact of the tome

Whenever you finish a short or long rest, you can perform a weaving ritual over the course of 10 minutes. When you finish, you can touch a number of creatures equal to your Charisma modifier. These creatures are immune to the web spell or natural webbing and climbing costs no extra movement while the creature is touching a web. This lasts until that creature finishes a short or long rest.

element.name: Assassin in the Dark
element.prerequisite: weaver of lies patron, pact of the chain

description.p: Weaver of lies patron, pact of the chain

If you have a shade widow as your familiar, it gains additional hit points equal to your warlock level. Whenever it uses the Bite action, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the target's first Constitution saving throw.

element.name: Binding Blast
element.prerequisite: weaver of lies patron, eldritch blast cantrip

description.p: Weaver of lies patron, eldritch blast cantrip

Whenever you cast eldritch blast, you can use a bonus action to send transparent webbing to bind all targets that you've hit with your eldritch blast. All targets must make a Wisdom saving throw against your warlock spell save DC. Those that fail cannot move farther away from others that have also failed until the beginning of your next turn, as ethereal webbing ties them together.

description.p: Weaver of lies patron, level 7
You can activate the Poisoned Mind feature whenever you cast a cantrip that targets only one enemy creature.

description.p: Weaver of lies patron, level 7

You can cast the web spell once without expending a spell slot. Once you do so, you cannot do so again until you finish a short or long rest. Whenever you cast web and maintain concentration for the full duration, you can choose to have the web become permanent and impossible to dispel.

element.name: The Silver Tongue
element.prerequisite: weaver of lies patron, pact of the blade

description.p: Weaver of lies patron, pact of the blade

You can create a dagger made of silver and bone using your Pact of the Blade feature. This weapon deals psychic damage. Whenever you strike a creature with this weapon, you can choose to inflict no damage. When you do, the target must make a Wisdom saving throw. If they fail, they are charmed by you until the start of your next turn, and will not take hostile actions against you, but may target your companions.
